protocol.text: Complete plants (45 DPG) were aerated with a gas mixture containing 10.5% oxygen (composed of a 1:1 mixture of ambient gas and N2) or ambient gas containing 21% oxygen for control samples in darkness for 1 hour. Plants were decapitated and immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen. About 70-80 siliques were dissected in liquid nitrogen for one biological replicate.
Plants were grown at 22°C under 16/8-h photoperiod, a relative air humidity of 60% and an approximate light intensity of 100-150 µmol photons m-2 second-1.

Total RNA was isolated from siliques using GENTRA kit (Biozym, Germany) according to the manufacturer´s instructions. RNA was further purified using RNeasy Kit (Quiagen) and subjected to DNAse digestion (Quiagen) according to the manufacturer´s instructions.

Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 2 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, Affymetrix) at the RZPD Deutsches Ressourcenzentrum für Genomforschung GmbH (Berlin, Germany).

After fragmentation, cRNA was hybridized to GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array according to Affymetrix standard protocol at RZPD. Gene Chips were washed and stained using fluidics protocol EUKGE-WS2V4_450.
GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 (Affymetrix).

Data were processed with the Affymetrix MicroArray Suite software package (MAS 5.0) and analyzed using Bioconductor packages in R. Data were normalized using the Robust Multi-array Average (RMA) method.
